LiveChatButton.autoGreeting:
Hello! Give me a moment to review your request and I'll be happy to help!
For security purposes, please do not share any sensitive personal information (i.e. date of birth or social security number) in this conversation. For details on our privacy practices, see our Privacy Policy [https://www.myubiquity.com/legal/].
We may maintain this conversation in our records for quality control, training, and audit purposes.
